sentences.sContent: Rather than pandering to younger readers, she poured out a poignant tale with the most beautiful language.
sentences.sContent_eng: Rather than pandering to younger readers, she poured out a poignant tale with the most beautiful language.
sentences.sCn: 作者没有刻意迎合年轻读者，而是用最美的笔触纵情描绘出寓意深刻的故事。

sentences.sContent: Full of entertaining and original characters, each two part story is warm, poignant and life-affirming, enjoying humour whilst exploring the darkness that underpins each crime mystery.
sentences.sContent_eng: Full of entertaining and original characters, each two part story is warm, poignant and life-affirming, enjoying humour whilst exploring the darkness that underpins each crime mystery.
sentences.sCn: 充满娱乐性和原创性字符，每两个部分的故事是温暖的，尖锐的，肯定生命，享受幽默，同时探索在黑暗中，支持每个犯罪神秘。

sentences.sContent: In her memoir, Klein offers a relentlessly funny yet poignant take on her journey to womanhood and beyond.
sentences.sContent_eng: In her memoir, Klein offers a relentlessly funny yet poignant take on her journey to womanhood and beyond.
sentences.sCn: 在她的回忆录中，克莱因对其作为女性以及未来的生活旅程进行了尖锐而有趣的审视。

synos.tran: 尖锐的；辛酸的；深刻的；切中要害的

remMethod.val: poign (刺) + ant → 说话带刺的 → 尖刻的

words.tran: 深刻地；辛辣地；令人辛酸地
